inference:
The hour hand moves 30 degrees per hour, so in 10 hours, it will have moved 30 * 10 = 300 degrees. The minute hand moves 6 degrees per minute, so in 10 o'clock, it will have moved 6 * 10 = 60 degrees. Therefore, the smaller angle between the hour and minute hands at 10 o'clock will be 300 - 60 = 240 degrees.
Final Answer: $\boxed{240}$. I hope it is correct.
